message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly beneficial for you.  I'm asking for $14,000.  What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of making an offer of $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective, but I believe the value of this product is closer to my initial offer.  How about we meet halfway at $13,000?

Hi Alice, I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll make a counteroffer of $11,500. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  It seems like we both see the value in this product.  To be fair, I'm willing to come down slightly to $12,500. This is my final offer.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down to $12,500, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer again, so I'll make a counteroffer of $11,000. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
